subTitle: Streamline the log analytics workloads
subDesc: Centralized Logging with OpenSearch is an AWS Solution that simplifies the build of log analytics pipelines, including log ingestion, log processing and log visualization.

benefits.title: Benefits and features
benefits.consoleDesc: Create and manage your log analytics pipelines with a few simple clicks on the web console.
benefits.ingestionDesc: Ingest both AWS service logs and application logs into log analytics engines in one place.
benefits.codelessDesc: Cleanup and enrich the log data without writing code via AWS-developed or AWS-verified log processor plugins.
benefits.insightDesc: Bootstrap the creation of log visualization dashboards to generate insights through a collection of built-in templates for AWS services and commonly-used software, e.g., Nginx, Apache HTTP Server, Microsoft IIS.

useCase.title: Use cases
useCase.troubleDesc: Ingest both AWS service logs and your application logs into log analytics engine. Understand what went wrong and why, then fix quickly.
useCase.complianceDesc: Store your log data to meet audit requirements. Enable your workload to comply with required policies, such as MLPS, GDPR.

getStarted.title: Get started
getStarted.pipelineDesc: Create log analytics pipeline for an AWS service
getStarted.appPipelineDesc: Create log analytics pipeline for an application

gettingStarted.title: Getting started
gettingStarted.firstInSolution: Getting started with Centralized Logging with OpenSearch
